DOC.brief_summary: This historical cohort study retrospective collection data comprise Nordic patient 's diagnosed Eisenmengers syndrome period 1977 2011 . The goal determine prognostic factor mortality morbidity .
DOC.detailed_description: The following variable obtain national registry individual fulfil inclusion criterion : - Personal data : Gender , day birth , vital status ( dead/alive ) , date death , cause death , cause hospitalization day - Specific cardiac malformation diagnosis - Heart-lung transplantation . - Social data : Highest educational level , marital status , employment status ( Denmark ) Primary endpoint - Incidence prevalence Eisenmenger Syndrome - All-cause mortality - All-cause morbidity ( hospitalization cause ) - Heart-lung transplantation - Advanced treatment - Mortality AT - Highest educational level - Personal income - Marital status - Job status
